channel.title: Shrooms
channel.description:
Yes, after error.login needing care i decided to watch it.
Personally, i found none of it scary but thats because i watch that kinda crap alot. But, if you get scared or something when you see blood you would be pissed scared(yes i think that make'f sence.)
The storyline is when a bounch of yankees goes to irland to do drink shrooms(magic musrooms), but all goes wrong ;)
Not going to spoil for you.

item.title: Shrooms
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:7, topic:184919”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=246623.msg2086894#msg2086894 date=1204603127]

Yes, after error.login needing care i decided to watch it.

Personally, i found none of it scary but thats because i watch that kinda crap alot.
But, if you get scared or something when you see blood you would be pissed scared(yes i think that make’f sence.)

The storyline is when a bounch of yankees goes to irland to do drink shrooms(magic musrooms), but all goes wrong

Not going to spoil for you.

I was under the impression you eat shrooms, not drink them :s
Oh well I know nothing about getting high…
[/quote]

Well mushrooms tea is a common method to eat the mushrooms, as they don’t exactly taste the greatest.

It’s crap, don’t waste your time jme.

Yeah I downloaded it and started watching it, I quit half way through. The shrooms [that I was on] made it impossible to pay attention to it…[/quote]

The ending is very confusing. Since your not going to bother watching it the main char(that girl who takes that “special” shroom) kills em all not knowing during it untill the end.

Read full topic

It’s crap, don’t waste your time jme.

Yeah I downloaded it and started watching it, I quit half way through. The shrooms [that I was on] made it impossible to pay attention to it…
